Unit.Name: Continuous multiplicative
Unit.Description: Response values are positive real numbers, e.g., weight, size.

Unit.Name: Continuous additive
Unit.Description: Response values are real numbers, e.g., weight change, temperature.

Unit.Name: Binary
Unit.Description: Response values have binary outcomes (yes/no, true/false, success/failure, 0/1, etc.).

Unit.Name: Quantal
Unit.Description: Response is measured in terms of number of successes out of N possible.

Unit.Name: Quantal group
Unit.Description: Individual responses are measured as binary values, which may be grouped to form a quantal response.

Unit.Name: Count
Unit.Description: Number of items (cells, molecules, deaths, etc.) in given interval/area/volume.

Unit.Name: Ordinal
Unit.Description: Relative scores (or graded scores) useable only for ranking.
